thread.title: Robert
thread.title_full: Security Camera Warehouse reviewed by Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: We were a Nuvico user and when our DVR broke I googled suppliers of like items and SCW was listed as a choice. I called to discuss why them over some of the more recognizable national brands and what they promised was a long relationship with excellent customer service. For the record, the service at Nuvico was terrible. The unit I ordered came in quickly, but it didn't work properly. Rather than give me a moments worth of trouble, they sent me a new unit that woks beautifully and everything I needed to return the broken one. I highly recommend this company and brand.
